blocks.content: Inspired by the thrill of Fantasy Football, Fantasy Box Office lets players draft and manage a lineup of movies instead of athletes — competing based on real-world box office performance. Built in Java for Android, the app taps into the Rotten Tomatoes API to pull live data on current theatrical releases.

Users start by logging in and browsing a curated list of in-theater films. Tapping a title opens a detailed dialog with stats, ratings, and performance metrics. The goal? Build a blockbuster portfolio and outscore your friends as the weekend numbers roll in.
This project was a fun blend of entertainment and data-driven strategy, combining API integration, UI design, and game logic into a playful, predictive experience.
